Title: Silver Tone Pocket Watch With Chain Roman Numerals Hand Wind Skeleton Works Runs
Description: Up for sale is a pocket watch, ornate silver tone metal case with skeleton back, hand winding. The front is hinged and see through, so the numbers can be seen without opening the watch. Watch opens by pushing in on the crown. Watch is running. The chain has a hook on one end and a clasp on the other end. The chain measures 29 inches, silver tone metal chain Check out my other items!Add me to your favorite sellers ! Track Page Views WithAuctiva's FREE Counter

ReturnPolicy.Description: I combine shipping on all my items for sale. Returns are accepted however due to rising shipping cost original shipping and handling cost are non-refundable they will only be refundable in cases where the item you receive is not the same as pictured in the listing for example **you bought a watch and received a book instead** In this case I will be more then happy to resolve this issue with you. Any item that has been altered, damaged, taken apart, modified or given as a gift returns will not be accepted. In the case of new items if you use an item that I have sold and it was sold as brand new a return will not be accepted because I will not be able to sell the item again as new. I will not accept unauthorized returns, returns must done through eBay . All returns must be done with in 14 days of receiving your item unless other arrangements have been made. Keep in mind used Vintage & Antique items may have some wear from use. Images are part of the description. If there are any problems or questions with your purchase or you are dissatisfied please contact me and your issues will be resolved. I strive for your 100% satisfaction.
